name: FlappX (xavier_dev)
description: Rework of the hit mobile game Flappy Bird now available on PC. Tons of new features, new music, new textures, new everything! Gameplay is more exciting than ever! New features, bosses and characters are being added every day! I would appreciate if you play my game, and if possible, write me a review on Discord (@dwx#3632) and I'll pay you for telling me your opinion on the game. Thanks for playing!
